mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lhb_resp_message ( ID, /* 返回消息ID */ MSG_CONTENT, /* 返回消息内容 */ MSG_TYPE, /* 返回消息类型(text:文本;music:音乐;news:图文;) */ MSG_TITLE, /* 消息标题 */ MSG_PIC, /* 消息图片链接 */ SKIP_URL /* 点击跳转链接 */ ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{msgContent}, #{msgType}, #{msgTitle}, #{msgPic}, #{skipUrl} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS id, /* 返回消息ID */ MSG_CONTENT AS msgContent, /* 返回消息内容 */ MSG_TYPE AS msgType, /* 返回消息类型(text:文本;music:音乐;news:图文;) */ MSG_TITLE AS msgTitle, /* 消息标题 */ MSG_PIC AS msgPic, /* 消息图片链接 */ SKIP_URL AS skipUrl /* 点击跳转链接 */ FROM lhb_resp_message WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ID AS id, /* 返回消息ID */ MSG_CONTENT AS msgContent, /* 返回消息内容 */ MSG_TYPE AS msgType, /* 返回消息类型(text:文本;music:音乐;news:图文;) */ MSG_TITLE AS msgTitle, /* 消息标题 */ MSG_PIC AS msgPic, /* 消息图片链接 */ SKIP_URL AS skipUrl /* 点击跳转链接 */ FROM lhb_resp_message WHERE 1=1
